intro: Impatiens moutsambotei, commonly known as the Moutsambotei Impatiens, is a flowering plant native to the tropical rainforests of Madagascar. It belongs to the Balsaminaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that come in shades of red, pink, and white. The plant typically grows as an upright herb with lance-shaped leaves and produces small, capsule-like fruits that contain numerous seeds. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in the undergrowth of dense forest habitats.
